title: Formulation optimization of lyophilized aptamer-gold nanoparticles: Maintained colloidal stability and cellular uptake
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Dalya Saidi, Marya Obeidat, Shrouq Alsotari, Abed-Alqader Ibrahim, Rula Al-Buqain, Suha Wehaibi, Dana A. Alqudah, Hamdi Nsairat, Walhan Alshaer, Alaaldin M. Alkilany
